column4:
1. Can create, edit, and delete project pages by category.
2. Can upload files, including:
  • Game builds (.zip)
  • Media files (.png, .jpg, .mp4)
  • External links (e.g., YouTube, Google Drive)
3. Can view project pages:
  • Game projects through WebGL builds
  • Animation projects through embedded video clips
  • Concept art or design portfolios (e.g., JPEG/PNG galleries, PDF)
4. Can provide feedback or comment on other students’ projects.
5. Can set tags for projects (e.g., Action, 3D, Year 3, Thesis). (Low piority)
6. Can download project files via provided links.
Can create, edit, view, and export personal profile information (name, profile picture, biography, project list, contact info, etc.).
Can invite other students as collaborators with specific edit permissions on selected project pages (e.g., editing description, uploading additional media, or managing tags).

1.Access and browse all student projects in Project pages 
2.View personal information ,export one pager summarized reports as PDF/Excel
Leave a feedback or comment on student projects in Project pages

1.Can view student projects and showcase pages, including project descriptions, images, downloadable media, and interactive WebGL build demos.
2.Can copy/share links to projects and download project files (if download is enabled by the project owner).
3.Can view student profiles with basic information only (e.g., name, profile picture, contact info, and list of showcased projects).
Can filter or search projects by tags, categories, or year.

Full account management system, including:
• Create new accounts
• Delete accounts
• Reset passwords for students and partners.

1. Can create, edit, and delete any project page.
2. Can add or remove collaborators from project pages.
Can add, edit, and delete categories and tags to maintain an organized project database.
Can view analytics of projects by year, category, tags, and type. Provides insights into project distribution and participation trends.
Generate reports (Excel/PDF) for institutional use (most create project by catagories,Most views,Projects by tags)
Can create new showcase event pages (e.g., Game Jam, Thesis Showcase) and select student projects to be highlighted.
